actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) radiant damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 5 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.
actions.name: Scintillating Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
At will: dancing lights, guidance
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
